description: Data was generated from file metadata for CCLE data in the GDC active archive for release 14 from December 2018. More details: https://docs.gdc.cancer.gov/Data/Release_Notes/Data_Release_Notes/#data-release-140

fields.description: Unique GDC identifier for this file (corresponds to the file_barcode) -- this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal like this: https://portal.gdc.cancer.gov/files/c21b332c-06c6-4403-9032-f91c8f407ba16
fields.name: file_gdc_id

fields.description: GDC unique identifier for this case (corresponds to the case_barcode) -- this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal like this: https://portal.gdc.cancer.gov/files/c21b332c-06c6-4403-9032-f91c8f407ba16
fields.name: case_gdc_id

fields.description: Case barcode e.g. EJM
fields.name: case_barcode

fields.description: Unique GDC identifier for this sample (corresponds to the sample_barcode), eg a1ec9279-c1a6-4e58-97ed-9ec1f36187c5 -- this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal
fields.name: sample_gdc_id

fields.description: CCLE sample barcode  eg CCLE-EJM
fields.name: sample_barcode

fields.description: Project name abbreviation, CCLE-MM
fields.name: project_short_name

fields.description: A code representing the type of cancer, e.g. MM
fields.name: disease_code

fields.description: Program Name, always CCLE in this table
fields.name: program_name

fields.description: Experimental source of the data type, eg Tissue slide image, RNA-Seq
fields.name: data_type

fields.description: Category description of the underlying data, eg Clinical, Raw Sequencing Data, Simple Nucleotide Variation, Transcriptome Profiling , etc
fields.name: data_category

fields.description: Experimental strategy used to generate data (where applicable) e.g. WXS, RNA-Seq
fields.name: experimental_strategy

fields.description: Description of the data, eg. clinical_supplement, aligned_reads
fields.name: type

fields.description: The size of a file measured in bytes (B), kilobytes (KB), megabytes (MB), gigabytes (GB), terabytes (TB), and larger values.
fields.name: file_size

fields.description: File format of the underlying data, eg BCR XML, BAM
fields.name: data_format

fields.description: Platform used to generate these data (null, Illumina)
fields.name: platform

fields.description: GCS path to original bam or vcf file
fields.name: file_name_key

fields.description: BAM or VCF index file GDC file UUID
fields.name: index_file_id

fields.description: GDC path to original vcf or bam index file
fields.name: index_file_name_key

fields.description: The size of a file measured in bytes (B), kilobytes (KB), megabytes (MB), gigabytes (GB), terabytes (TB), and larger values.
fields.name: index_file_size

fields.description: Data accessibility policy (open or controlled)
fields.name: access

fields.description: Access Control List -- if access is controlled, this field contains the dbGaP accession, eg phs000179
fields.name: acl
